dialogue: Our special guest is Tod, from our research department.
We recently did a study to assess the value of our previous research.
Sadly, all of our past work was either ignored or totally misinterpreted by idiots...
So from now on, rather than do research, we'll just lie.
Play along and we'll make sure the "industry salaries" study goes your way.
Well, it's two o'clock, and that's quitting time in the research department.
You're not my role model anymore... I've found another.
